it.polimi.se2019.network.client.rmi

Class RMIClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.network.client.rmi.RMIClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConnectionToServerInterface, RMIClientInterface, java.rmi.Remote 

    public class RMIClient
extends java.lang.Object
implements ConnectionToServerInterface, RMIClientInterface
    This class is the bridge between the server and the client. The server calls methods of this class in order to communicate with the client. And the client does the same in order to communicate with the server.
    Author:
    Desno365

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RMIClient(MessageReceiverInterface messageReceiver)
      Creates a new instance of a RMIClient and starts the connection with the server.

      Closes the connection with the server.

      Called by the RMI server to check for a connection lost.
      boolean isConnectionActive()
      Returns true if and only if the connection is active.
      void receiveMessage(Message message)
      Called by the RMI server in order to send a message.

      • connectionListenerSubjectInClient

        public void connectionListenerSubjectInClient()
                                       throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                                              java.lang.InterruptedException
        Called by the RMI server to check for a connection lost. When this method interrupts the server knows the connection has been lost.
        Specified by:
        connectionListenerSubjectInClient in interface RMIClientInterface
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
        java.lang.InterruptedException
